title: Nikita Zadorov made life miserable for Maple Leafs in back-to-back Bruins wins
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins "Just play hard against the top players on their team.
That's my job.

title: David Pastrnak’s 400th career goal with Bruins was fitting — for several reasons
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins “He does it his way, right?
I can't really compare him — maybe [Alex] Ovechkin a little bit.

title: Northern Lights illuminate Boston-area skies
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News The Northern Lights were visible across Boston and New England skies Tuesday night, caused by a geomagnetic storm.
ShareSend this article to your social connections.
You don’t have to travel to Iceland to see the Northern Lights — if you’re in New England, you may be able to simply look outside.

title: As Patriots’ young core grows, Stefon Diggs calls Mike Vrabel a ‘perfect parent’ to guide them
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots "He's kind of like that perfect parent, tough on you.
He knows how to tough love you, that positive reinforcement.
" Mike Vrabel Barry Chin/Globe Staff The difference between this year’s Patriots team and last year’s squad is almost indescribable.

title: MIT scores legal win as federal court dismisses appeal in lawsuit claiming campus protests were antisemitic
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News "Gathering together in groups on campus, disrupting campus tranquility, and impeding travel for many students” is not antisemitic, the court ruled.
Israeli flags hung by Jewish students were “bloodied” by Palestinian supporters who have a tent encampment’ on the MIT campus.
John Tlumacki/The Boston Globe ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: Pastrnak scores twice, hits 400-goal milestone as Bruins beat Maple Leafs
author: The Associated Press
bullets: Boston Bruins Pavel Zacha, Hampus Lindholm and Alex Steeves also scored for the Bruins while Jeremy Swayman made 30 saves.
Bruins right wing David Pastrnak celebrates after scoring on Toronto Maple Leafs goaltender Dennis Hildeby for his 400th career goal.

AP Photo/Charles Krupa BOSTON (AP) — David Pastrnak scored twice to move past 400 goals for his career, and added an assist, as the Boston Bruins won their seventh consecutive game, 5-3 over the Toronto Maple Leafs on Tuesday night.

title: Jeff Passan maps out ‘perfect’ offseason move for the Red Sox
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Red Sox "He'll need to get creative in improving a Red Sox team that's already quite good.
